mean_cn: n. 突变体，突变异种；  adj. 突变的
mean_en: a plant or animal that is different from other plants or animals of the same kind because of a change in the structure of its genes :something produced by genetic mutation
word_etyma: mut变+ant…的 → 变异的，变异所引起的
sentence: What the hell is this creature? Must be some kind of mutant!
sentence_trans: 那是什么鬼？肯定是什么突变异种。
